revised_title: Investigating Oncogenicity in SV 40-Transformed Hamster Heart Cell Line and Its Clones
tldr: The study investigates the factors behind the increased oncogenicity of an SV 40-transformed hamster heart cell line after in vivo passage. The research explores two possible mechanisms: selection of cells with high oncogenicity and cellular mutation. The findings provide no evidence that the viral genome is responsible for the increase in oncogenicity and contribute to a better understanding of tumor progression.
